name: College of Creation
description: Bards of the College of Creation draw on the Song of Creation to animate art and objects with primordial magic.

3.name: Mote of Potential
3.description: Whenever you give a creature a Bardic Inspiration die, you create a Tiny mote that orbits within 5 feet of it and enhances the die with additional effects for ability checks, attack rolls, or saving throws.

3.name: Performance of Creation
3.description: As an action, create one nonmagical item worth up to 20 times your bard level that lasts a number of hours equal to your proficiency bonus. The item must be Medium or smaller and appears within 10 feet.

6.name: Animating Performance
6.description: As an action, animate a Large or smaller nonmagical item within 30 feet as a Dancing Item for 1 hour. It obeys your commands and acts on your initiative.

14.name: Creative Crescendo
14.description: You can create multiple items with Performance of Creation up to a number equal to your Charisma modifier, ignoring gp limits; only one can be of the maximum size.

choices.name: College of Creation Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the College of Creation subclass
